item.description:
I'm training for the Hartford Half and hoping to pick up speed but the track is also great for new and seasoned runners looking for group motivation.

Planning to do a mile or so warm up which would be a great opportunity to mingle with newer runners. After that I will most likely do a little speed work consisting of 400 or 800's at speed followed by a walking or slow jog recover lap.

Found this calculator to help determine workout pace based on desired results.

http://www.runningfor...
item.how_to_find_us: Should be easy to spot people hanging around inside the track area.
item.name: North Haven Track
